replies.body: Hey i think a bone oriented {{champion:33}} would be pretty cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Balthazar2319,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=J5s7JLi7,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-24T05:18:03.242+0000)
>
> Hey i think a bone oriented {{champion:33}} would be pretty cool.

i know he already is very bony, but i was thinking more along the lines of that {{champion:266}} skin
Any Reksai skin would be accepted, her eternium skin looks meh.
Plus the fact that it's a 1350 skin with really no new particle effects. You would think that rito would at least make her tunnels different..
OVER 9000! up votes for that aatrox skin.
These are great! Who else could get a boneclaw skin... maybe {{champion:84}}? {{champion:107}}? {{champion:92}}?
Headhunter is close enough I think for {{champion:107}}
That should be classic Rek TBH.
I know but it is so close to being something different might as well make it  happen
Isn't Headhunter Rengar already pretty bone-oriented?

That Aatrox... Holy shit.
Anyway, I think the theme is pretty cool and could work on a few champs
{{champion:266}} {{champion:421}} (The two you listed)
{{champion:150}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:48}} Maybe
I would but the Rek Sai one!
I could see the Aatrox one being "Underworld/Lich Slayer Aatrox" more than "Boneclaw Aatrox". The Rek'sai early concept is still really cool, but likely never going to happen.
Bonelord Aatrox. I think these would be really neat to see though.
